document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">nearness </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">sundered </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7cf0ff">Things </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7cf0ff">Soul </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">has </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7cf0ff">special </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">times </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">When </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">Dimness </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">looks </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">Oddity </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">Distinctness </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">easy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">seems </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">Shapes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">we </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#08ffb8">buried, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#58d4e8">dwell </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">about, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">Familiar, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">Rooms </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">Untarnished </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">by </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">Sepulchre, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">Mouldering </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">Playmate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">comes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">just </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">Jacket </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">he </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">wore </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b0bcff">Long </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">buttoned </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">Mold </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Since </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">we </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">old </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b0bcff">mornings, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">Children </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">played </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">Divided </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">by </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7cf0ff">world </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">Grave </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">yields </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">back </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">Robberies </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">Years, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">our </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">pilfered </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7cf0ff">Things </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">Bright </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">Knots </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b0bcff">Apparitions </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b0bcff">Salute </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">us, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">their </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">wings </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">As </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">we </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">were </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">perished </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Themself </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">had </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">just </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">remained </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">till </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">we </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">rejoin </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">them </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'twas </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">they, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5080ff">ourself </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">mourned </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Of nearness to her sundered things
